description:
Ready to start playing right away on that new guitar? Or simply wanting to pick up an old friend after a long time?

This course will teach you to play three Christmas favorites just in time for the holidays. Songs are original arrangements for new guitarists or someone that simply wants something quick and easy to learn and play right away.

Jingle Bells, Good King Wenceslas and We Wish You a Merry Christmas! will be at your fingertips by course end.

Course Material and Content Include:

Downloadable .pdf files of the sheetmusic for each song.

A Performance Video of each song.

Close up instructional video for finger picking for each song.

Looping videos of several sections of the songs to help work your way up to perfomance speed (and beyond :)).
title: Guitar for Christmas!
